endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of identified vulnerabilities within the organization's system network based on preset configurations.
Initiate a network-wide scan to detect potential vulnerabilities.
Retrieve the results of a specific scan using its unique identifier.
Create new configurations to tailor vulnerability detection parameters.
Modify an existing configuration using its unique identifier.
Delete an existing configuration using its unique identifier.
Retrieve a list of recommended actions to address identified vulnerabilities.
Submit a request to apply specific mitigation measures to the system network.
Retrieve a list of generated reports detailing vulnerability assessments and mitigations.
Request an export of detailed reports in specified formats (e.g., PDF, CSV).
